author: dag
msg: DERBY-3897 SQLSessionContext not correctly initialized in some non-method call nested contexts
Patch derby-3897-3, which sets up the SQL session context correctly
also for substatements. See javadoc for
enumeration of these cases. Also adds test cases for this.

author: adrianc
msg: WorkEffort improvements: WorkEffortServices.getWorkEffortEventsByPeriod will return work efforts that have a null estimatedCompletionDate. Moved the code that removed duplicate work efforts to a separate method so it can be reused.

author: jaydm
msg: GERONIMO-4325 Repackaged the mini release bundle.  Everything in the original bundle
was nested in an additional 'dojo' directory.  Removed the extra directory level so
that all existing references to the dojo.js file would not need to be touched.
